basic_information.scholarship_name: LeRoy G. Coffman Endowed Scholarship in Athletics
basic_information.college_name: College of Education and Professional Studies

description: To provide a scholarship to benefit student-athletes who meet the following criteria: Eligibility Requirements Must have a minimum of 3.0 GPA Must be a student-athlete who plans to enter the teaching profession Must submit UCO transcript Open to undergraduate or graduate students This scholarship is available to apply for during the Current UCO Student Application.
